mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.zhaopinxinxi_id as zhaopinxinxiId ,a.yingpinjilu_name as yingpinjiluName ,a.yingpinjilu_phone as yingpinjiluPhone ,a.yingpinjilu_id_number as yingpinjiluIdNumber ,a.jiaoyu_content as jiaoyuContent ,a.gongzuo_content as gongzuoContent ,a.geren_content as gerenContent ,a.yingpin_time as yingpinTime ,a.mianshi_types as mianshiTypes ,a.mianshi_jieguo_types as mianshiJieguoTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_name as zhaopinxinxiName ,zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_types as zhaopinxinxiTypes ,zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_number as zhaopinxinxiNumber ,zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_content as zhaopinxinxiContent
FROM yingpinjilu a left JOIN zhaopinxinxi zhaopinxinxi ON a.zhaopinxinxi_id = zhaopinxinxi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.zhaopinxinxi_id = #{params.zhaopinxinxiId} )
and a.yingpinjilu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yingpinjiluName},'%')
and a.yingpinjilu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yingpinjiluPhone},'%')
and a.yingpinjilu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yingpinjiluIdNumber},'%')
and a.jiaoyu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoyuContent},'%')
and a.gongzuo_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuoContent},'%')
and a.geren_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.gerenContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yingpin_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yingpinTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yingpin_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yingpinTimeEnd})
and a.mianshi_types = #{params.mianshiTypes}
and a.mianshi_jieguo_types = #{params.mianshiJieguoTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.zhaopinxinxi_id IS NOT NULL
and zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhaopinxinxiName},'%')
and zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_types = #{params.zhaopinxinxiTypes}
and zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_number >= #{params.zhaopinxinxiNumberStart}
and zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_number <= #{params.zhaopinxinxiNumberEnd}
and zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_number = #{params.zhaopinxinxiNumber}
and zhaopinxinxi.zhaopinxinxi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhaopinxinxiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zhaopinxinxi.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zhaopinxinxi.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
